x_highlights.text: Tomorrow at 10am PT legacy models (GPT-5, GPT-4o, GPT-4.1, GPT-4.1 mini, and OpenAI o4-mini) will be deprecated in ChatGPT.
x_highlights.author: OpenAI Newsroom

x_highlights.text: We've raised $30B in funding at a $380B post-money valuation. Our run-rate revenue is $14 billion, and has grown over 10x in each of the past 3 years.
x_highlights.author: Anthropic

x_highlights.text: The maker of the Claude chatbot saw visits to its site jump 6.5% following its Super Bowl advertisement... Daily active users also saw an 11% jump post-game, the most significant within the firm's AI coverage.
x_highlights.author: CNBC Report

x_highlights.text: Z.ai (æ™ºè°±) pulled off one of the more creative model launches in recent memory. The company secretly uploaded its new flagship, GLM-5, to OpenRouter under the codename Pony Alpha... Within days, the anonymous model topped OpenRouter's popularity charts, processing 60 billion tokens per day.
x_highlights.author: Voice of Context

x_highlights.text: Introducing our new model, MiniMax-M1, the world's first open-source, large-scale, hybrid-attention reasoning model... A significant advantage of M1 is its support for an industry-leading 1 million token context window... The entire reinforcement learning phase used only 512 H800s for three weeks, with a rental cost of just $534,700.
x_highlights.author: MiniMax Official

x_highlights.text: Google says hackers sent 100,000 prompts in an attempt to clone its Gemini AI model, raising fresh concerns about AI security and model extraction.
x_highlights.author: Pulse Nigeria

x_highlights.text: OpenAI is killing its ultra-popular GPT-4o and several of its older models -- for real this time. As of 10 a.m. PT on Friday, those models will be gone.
x_highlights.author: CNET

x_highlights.text: Anthropic has forecast reducing its cash burn to roughly a third of revenue in 2026 and just 9% by 2027, with a break-even target of 2028 â€“ two years ahead of its rival.
x_highlights.author: The Guardian
